ComicInfo.Penciller: John Rosenberger,Ogden Whitney,Paul Reinman,Tom Hickey,John R.,Ogden Whitney,John R.,Paul Reinman,Tom Hickey
ComicInfo.Summary:
So Long, Fellas!: The ghost of Jack Lewis exposes a railroad scam with the help of the dog he left behind.
Unknown Journey!: Greg Baker and Stan Winters are transported back through time by aliens intent on conquering Earth, but they destroy the aliens' fleet of ships and return to their own time.
The Things on the Mountain Top!: Explorers Martin and Swanson find evidence of worship on a mountain top, but can come up with no explanation how it could get there.
The Wizard's Wand!: Egyptologists Pete Murray and Rod Emmons find a magic wand, but in order to get out of a jam they have to use it to restore things to what they were before they had the wand, so the wand, and their memories of it, fade away.
ComicInfo.Title: So Long, Fellas!; Unknown Journey!; The Things on the Mountain Top!; The Wizard's Wand!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Ogden Whitney (host),Jack Lewis,Torelli,Linda Jensen,Skippy (dog),Ray Danvers,Shane O'Shea (host)
